data.title: The Eleanor Crosses: A Journey Set in Stone
data.meta_description: Discover the story of the remarkable crosses erected by Edward I as memorials to his first wife, Eleanor of Castile, and take a close-up look at the finest of the three surviving crosses, at Geddington in Northamptonshire.
data.text:
VISIT THE GEDDINGTON CROSS

Find out how you can visit the Eleanor Cross at Geddington, the best preserved of the three intact surviving crosses.

ELEANOR OF CASTILE: SPANISH PRINCESS AND ENGLISH QUEEN

Listen to this episode of the English Heritage Podcast to find out more about Eleanor of Castileâ€™s life and legacy.

MORE HISTORIES

Delve into our history pages to discover more about our sites, how they have changed over time, and who made them what they are today.
